name: Dark and Clean Userstyles
description: Part of my grander stylistic overhaul, makes a darker, cleaner, and simpler Userstyles.org for a better user experience.  Questions and comments are always welcome, future updates are inevitable as I use these styles myself, were anything to change or stick out, I would work on making an update to it for both you, and me.

user.name: 8cr14mov
user.about: I'm a pretty stand up guy. Yeah? My styles aren't perfect, but they work pretty well. At least, that's my opinion. Honestly, if you ever need something updated, or there's an issue, feel free to contact me about it.
